about_the_game:
The immortal path is vast and boundless, and it is all about cultivating its cause and effect. The long road is long and winding, taking small steps. The reason why the world of cultivating immortals is wonderful lies in its magnificent and vast world, in the long journey of seeking immortality, in concealing the sharpness behind people, in promoting the fame of immortals in front of oneself, in soaring freely in all directions, and in wandering beyond the sky and gaining enlightenment in the human world.

Ordinary young people enter the immortal realm, while friends and family set foot in life.

Main storyline: The main storyline revolves around the protagonist entering the Changsheng Gate of the Immortal Cultivation Sect. Players can experience the highly academic style of the sect's path of cultivating immortals, participating in the Great Dao, the path of cultivating immortals, refining elixirs, forging treasures, with formation talismans and puppets as assistants, and refining and storing the Sea God's consciousness and physique as divine powers. Every cultivation detail game has detailed descriptions, which are very immersive.

Character interaction: The game is designed with a large number of interactive methods around special plot characters and ordinary characters, ranging from simple gifts, transactions, gambling, killing, to becoming a Taoist couple, taking in concubines, taking in male pets, refining them into cauldrons, apprenticing, taking in apprentices, getting married, and having children. Combining musical notes to strengthen the bridge of character communication, numerous interactive methods can help players experience a highly human like world of cultivation.

Academic Immortal Cultivation: There are numerous activities within the sect, and in addition to basic task releases, players can also receive and place orders. You can track the rankings of heaven, earth, and people, participate in the entrance competition, external disciple qualification competition, internal disciple ranking competition, and core disciple ranking competition. You can participate in the annual Immortal Cultivation Lecture Hall and Five Arts Lecture Hall, and sign life and death duels with enemies at the Zongmen Square. Various activities await players' experiences.

Spirit, sword, body, and demon compete for the right path, while alchemy, talismans, and puppetry complement each other.

Character cultivation: There are many directions for character combat cultivation in the game. There are five main paths: Spirit Path, Sword Path, Body Path, Demon Path, and Divine Path, as well as corresponding paths such as Five Elements Peak, Bright Sword Peak, Waterfall Body Peak, Hehuan Peak, and Refining God Peak. cultivators between different paths can also learn from each other's strengths and weaknesses, and practice together. The results of cultivation vary with each play.

Five Arts Practice: In the game, alchemy, refining tools, formations, talismans, and puppets are collectively referred to as the Five Arts, with a large number of interesting details set up. Players can design their own alchemy strategies and blueprints according to their needs, and can also refine a large number of talismans in order to defeat the enemy with one strike in battle!

Spiritual energy still follows the meridians, and spiritual energy should be generated with courage.

Combat System: The game's combat system is an instant combat system with strong adversarial and strategic capabilities. Players with different combat styles can freely combine their divine powers, treasures, and props. For example, the Fire faction with the Five Elements Peak for quick attack, the Slaughter Sword faction with the Bright Sword Peak for defense, the Earth faction with the Five Elements Peak for defense, the Gold faction with the Five Elements Peak for both offense and defense, and the Rende Sword faction with the Bright Sword Peak for long-term battle, the Body Cultivation Avenue with the Waterfall Body Peak.

Treasure props: The game contains a large number of treasure props, each with unique abilities such as defense, control, attack, spatial effects, or the ability to freeze time. Different magical tools and props need to be collected by players themselves to cultivate their invincible cultivators.

Kaitian asked about the fate of the calamity and whether I would become an immortal or an adult.

Transforming the mortal into an immortal: The path to becoming an immortal is to sharpen the mortal heart and remove the mortal bones. It's reincarnation and downfall, it's the path of singlehood. The ultimate outcome is in your choice!

After experiencing a magical opportunity, they will learn how to cultivate themselves, ask themselves questions, and embark on a path to immortality.
